channel.title: How do I add a custom pickup command?
channel.description: Ok is it possible to make a command where you need lvl 3 rights to use it? like say one of my admins does ::pickup 1050 1 is it possible so only lvl 3 rights/i can do it and then make a sendMessage command saying, you don't have the rights to do that!

item.title: How do I add a custom pickup command?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Hmmm. I am not really sure, but maybe something like this?

if(newItemID == ####) { sendMessage("You can't spawn that item!"); } else

Not sure, you would also have to finish that off to fit your code since it has the else-if. Have a backup and try it.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I add a custom pickup command?

item.title: How do I add a custom pickup command?
item.dc:creator: @Bubbsy7 Bubbsy7
item.description:
@Bubbsy7 wrote:

No no no no no, I want admins still to be able to pickup, but I just want to disable them from picking up certain items, such as rares, and stuff like that…

&& = and

if(command.equals("blah") && playerRights == 3) {

item.title: How do I add a custom pickup command?
item.dc:creator: @Bubbsy7 Bubbsy7
item.description:
@Bubbsy7 wrote:

So you mean like this?

if (command.startsWith("pickup 1050") && (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Owner Rawr64") || playerRights = 3)) { try { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,11)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12)); if (/*newItemID <= 10000 && */newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("That Item Doesn't Excist"); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Cmon Type It Right ! "); } }

Read full topic
